options.basicOption1: FREE QR digital menu within 48 hours when contracting any of our packages.
options.basicOption2: Free local advertising campaign on Instagram/Facebook (you only pay the ad budget).
options.basicOption3: Ready-to-use social media templates (1 week FREE).
options.basicOption4: We optimize your Google My Business for FREE and show you how to appear on the map in 7 days.
options.mediumOption1: Digital menu design with QR (Easy to Update)
options.mediumOption2: Google My Business optimization to attract nearby customers
options.mediumOption3: 8 monthly posts (attractive designs with photos/texts you share with us)
options.mediumOption4: 1 basic advertising campaign on Facebook/Instagram (location targeted)
options.premiumOption1: Full social media management: 20 posts + 8 weekly stories
options.premiumOption2: Advanced advertising campaigns on Meta ads and Google ads
options.premiumOption3: Digital loyalty strategies: WhatsApp Business + email marketing + digital coupons
options.premiumOption5: Creation of a landing page or mini website with digital menu, reservations, and online orders
options.premiumOption6: Monthly metric reports with strategic recommendations
